attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When an MP sells any home where taxpayer money has been used to renovate, repair or upgrade it, they should refund all grants out of any profit made on the sale.  This should include first or second or any home assisted by taxpayer money.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
